title: i got perma banned and i have no idea why
body: so i basically had a bad game in awhile and the only thing i said that was bad was "braindead" yes i agree i was salty but i still did my job as a toplaner i got towers and farmed. I complained about my team cause i wouldnt receive any sort of help but i still dont understand why one bad game out of many deserves a perma ban the last time i was banned was a very long time ago

replies.body: Even if you don't think your teammates are playing well enough, that doesn't necessarily mean it's alright to belittle them or start fighting with your own teammates. You should have a reform card that tells you exactly what it was that got you punished, but if not you can reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more context.
yes i agree but even though i did type in chat i wouldnt do anything i still helped my team
Did Riot send you the chat logs? If so, would you please share them so we can all see them?

sure
